import React from 'react'; import QuoteForm from '../components/QuoteForm'; import heroBg from '../assets/hero-bg.jpg'; import CTABanner from '../components/CTABanner'; import { pricingPlans, faqs } from '../config'; const PricingPage = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Transparent Pricing

No hidden fees, no surprises. Get instant quotes for all our services.

Free Estimates
Fully Insured
24/7 Support
{/* Pricing Cards Section */}

Our Service Pricing

Choose the service that fits your needs. All prices include professional service and basic insurance.

{pricingPlans.map((plan) => (
{plan.popular &&
Most Popular
}

{plan.title}

{plan.description}

Starting at {plan.startingPrice}
    {plan.features.map((feature, index) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Quote Calculator Section */}
); }; export default PricingPage;
